synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Heavier alkali metal tBuDHPs outperform lighter congeners. Cs(tBuDHP) is the optimal pre-catalyst.

synthesis_conditions.method: Transmetallating the lithium congener with appropriate alkali metal alkoxides
synthesis_conditions.storage_conditions: Stable for months under inert conditions as powders in a freezer

synthesis_conditions.catalyst: AM(tBuDHP) (AM = Li, Na, K, Rb, Cs)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Cs(tBuDHP) gave the best results with 97% yield in 1 hour at 70 °C.
Cs(tBuDHP) provided nearly quantitative yields in C6D6.

synthesis_conditions.catalyst: AM(tBuDHP) (AM = Li, Na, K, Rb, Cs)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Cs(tBuDHP) again gave the best results with quantitative yields in 15 minutes at room temperature in THF-d8.

synthesis_conditions.product: Crystals of the pyridine solvate {[Cs(tBuDHP)]2 · py}∞ (3) and monomeric tris-pyridine solvate [Li(tBuDHP) · (py)3] (4)
